page.title: 06 FACILITIES
page.content: There are 33 shop units in the precinct and 3 blocks of 5 shops dotted around the estate. All the units are not being used. Some shopkeepers are loathe to set up business because of the vandalism. "Damage has been caused by youths," say the residents. A resident said the badly designed shopping precinct should have a gate to enclose it. A pub is at one end and a chip shop at the other. People come from the pub through the precinct,doing damage on their way to their chip shop. There is a Community Centre for various clubs-a Disabled Club,a Rainbow Club etc. Community Routes is an excellent transport service but it is in some danger because of finance. There is a Kenward Travel and Trust to help poor children to have holidays. A Police Station which closes at 6pm.
